channel.title: I NEED HELP on my server~~~~~badly
channel.description:
well hi my name is robbert, im kinda new to moparscape just tried to make my server last week. i have been haveing problems i got a server source called chood Isle pk and one problem is when ever i click on runserver it says....(this device is not ready press any key to continue). what does that mean can maybe someone help me out.
this is the code on it: @echo off title runserver "D:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java" -cp . -Xmx500m server pause
thats what it says what i do to make it so i can play cause it says devise is not ready.
someone help me please.
thank you for you time and help :)

i downloaded the java 6u2

[br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2007, 05:15:32 PM[/size][hr]you there?

item.title: I NEED HELP on my server~~~~~badly
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

robbert ownz:

now it says system cannot find the path specified[br][size=1]Posted on: July 18, 2007, 05:10:40 PM[/size][hr]what is going on i typed what u said and it wont work

I never said it was going to work. Now tell me what version of JDK you have then I will be able to fix it for you.

item.title: I NEED HELP on my server~~~~~badly
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Change

@echo off
title runserver
"D:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java" -cp . -Xmx500m server
pause

To

@echo off
title runserver
"C:\Program Files\java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java" -cp . -Xmx500m server
pause

And tell me what you get then.

Read full topic
